meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a lemur in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The fluffy tail of the lemurlike creature swayed gently as it moved through the trees.
meanings.sent2: The zoo visitors were amazed by the lemurlike features of the small primate.
meanings.sent3: The lemurlike antics of the mischievous toddler brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements on the dance floor were as lemurlike as they were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of a lemurlike creature in his detailed painting.
